newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia's shipping line appoints executive.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia's shipping line appoints executive.

text.p: Australian government-owned shipping line ANL Ltd said on Friday it had appointed John Lines as chief operating officer.
Executive chairman Ted Anson said in a statement Lines would oversee ANL's bulk and land-based businesses in addition to his previous role of directing the liner shipping operations.
